Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: イーフォンの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Eephon

Entry.JapaneseText: イーフォンの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Eephon

Entry.JapaneseText: ゼレン湿原の泉
Entry.EnglishText: Zeren Wetlands Spring

Entry.JapaneseText: ゼレン湿原の泉
Entry.EnglishText: Zeren Wetlands Spring

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなものが泉の底に 隠されていたとは……
Entry.EnglishText: To think that something like this was hidden beneath the spring...

Entry.JapaneseText: この先に、<Blue>闇の力<White>が あるというのか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Dark Power<White> should be up ahead, I assume?

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなものがあるのに、 ナニもないってコトは ないんじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: There's no way a place like this wouldn't have something inside it, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Blue>闇の力<White>を求めし者たちよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Those who seek the <Blue>Dark Power<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今の声は……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Whose voice is that...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>闇の力<White>を得て何を望む。
Entry.EnglishText: For what desire would you use the <Blue>Dark Power<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 声の主よ、我々は世界に満ちた 悪しき<Blue>思念<White>を消し、 人々の争いを止めるために <Yellow>聖者の力<White>を必要としています。
Entry.EnglishText: Whomever you may be... We wish to purge the evil <Yellow>scourge<White> which has invaded this world, and put an end to the conflict of our people. For that, we need the <Yellow>Saint's Power<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが、 その聖者なのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you one such Saint?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>の争いは、 <Blue>思念<White>のもたらすものなのか。 <Blue>思念<White>の前に、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>は争う事はなかったか。
Entry.EnglishText: You believe that the conflict of <Yellow>people<White> was brought forth from the <Blue>scourge<White>? Before the <Blue>scourge<White>, <Yellow>people<White> knew not of war?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>は今、古と同じ過ちを 繰り返さんとしている。 あるいは、ふたつの種族の争いは 続いていたのではあるまいか。
Entry.EnglishText: <Yellow>People<White> of the present are merely repeating the mistakes of those in the past. Has the strife between races not simply continued forward?

Entry.JapaneseText: 相容れぬ間柄ならば、 どちらかが滅ぶまで争えば良い。 さすれば争いの種は消える。
Entry.EnglishText: If such strife cannot be quelled, then it would be wise to let it continue until one side has perished. Only then will the seed of conflict vanish.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなのって…… ひどい……
Entry.EnglishText: How could you say that...? That's horrible...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの娘よ、本当にそう思うか。 汝は、ガジュマを憎んでいるのでは なかったか。
Entry.EnglishText: Do you truly believe so, young Huma? Do you not harbor hatred of Gajuma within your heart?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえはゲオルギアスの手先か。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Are you one of Geyorkias' underlings?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはゲオルギアスの手先かって 聞いてんだよ、このヤロウッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I asked you a damn question, so answer me!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとかガジュマとか 種族なんて関係ねぇ!! おれたちは、同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>として 今までうまくやって来たんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma, Gajuma, why the hell does that even matter?! Everything we've done, everything we've accomplished was just by being “<Yellow>people<White>!”

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアスが…… <Blue>思念<White>ってヤツが ブチ壊そうとしてるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Geyorkias... He and his stupid “<Blue>scourge<White>” are just screwing us all over!

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にヒューマとガジュマは 同じだと思っているのか。
Entry.EnglishText: You believe that Huma and Gajuma are truly one and the same?

Entry.JapaneseText: <scale:0180><Cyan>同じ<White>だ!!<color:0100>
Entry.EnglishText: <scale:0180>THEY ARE THE<Cyan>SAME<White>!!<color:0100>

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたが<Yellow>聖者<White>で、 <Blue>闇の力<White>が<Yellow>聖者の力<White>なら、 そいつでゲオルギアスの<Blue>思念<White>を 消せば、すぐにわかる事だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you're a <Yellow>Saint<White>, and the <Blue>Dark Power<White> is the same as the <Yellow>Saint's Power<White>, then you're gonna get a wake-up call when we use that power to get rid of Geyorkias' <Blue>scourge<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ならば我の元に来るが良い。 そして、示せ。 汝の信じるものを。
Entry.EnglishText: Then you shall come before me. Show me. Show me the strength of your beliefs!

Entry.JapaneseText: やってやろうじゃねえか!! みんな、行こうぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Nothin' would make me happier! Come on guys, let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: さて、次の聖獣だが、 どこへ行けばいいんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, where to next? We still have more Sacred Beasts to find.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……陽炎の荒野か…… 思い当たる場所といえば、 クロダダク砂漠…… あるいはツルベナ荒野……
Entry.EnglishText: A wasteland amidst a “shimmering haze,” huh... The first thing that comes to mind is the Klodadakh Desert... Or perhaps, the Silvena Wasteland.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたんだ、<Hilda>？
Entry.EnglishText: Something wrong, <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうして……あなたなの……？ どうして……私じゃないの？ 私には聖獣の力が必要なのに……
Entry.EnglishText: You... Why you? Why not...me? I NEED that Sacred Beast's power, and yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をそんなにカリカリしてんだ？ らしくないぜ、<Hilda>？
Entry.EnglishText: What're you so grouchy about? This isn't like you, <Hilda>!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたたちには わからないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's nothing any of you will understand.

Entry.JapaneseText: 次の行き先だけど…… ツルベナ荒野かもしれないなら、 ピピスタはどうかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, as for our next destination... Supposing we head for Silvena Wasteland, how about stopping by Pipista?

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ？
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ、ツルベナ荒野の近くにある村で、 ピピスタは、古代カレギア語で 「鳥の巣」を意味するわ。 <Blue>眠れる翼<White>と関係ありそうじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, it's a town near the wasteland. In the ancient Callegean tongue, “Pipista” means “bird's nest.” It may have some connection to the <Blue>sleeping wings<White>, don't you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ、調べてみる価値はありそうだな。 ひとまずピピスタへ向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: Hm, seems worth looking into at least. Let's head there first.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
